Text: Appalachian PrioritiesAs you know Terry Franklin is beginning to transition into the Appalachian coordination role We spent time today with Bryce Baxter Wade Price and Gloria Barkowsky to determine how best to attack the current issues As Job we determined that Terrys time is best utilized on transportation contract setup Of course Terry job description includes other tasks but at this time this is her focus We decided this for the following reasons Deals cannot be pathed without transportation contracts setup in SITARA In order to pay the producers and the pipeline the deals must be pathed by Logistics zero volume paths and volumes must by allocated based on actuals by Gloria Barkowsky Volume Mgmt Wade Price Settlements is focused on setting up SITARA deals for producer wellhead purchases Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns Thanks Carrie

Terry FranklinAppalachian Coordinatoram pleased to announce that Terry Franklin will be joining the Transportation Rates team in a newly created positionthe Appalachian Coordinator role Terry brings years of transportation wellhead and Enron experience to the position and we are excited to have her join the team In her new position Terry will be responsible for the following Understand the Appalachian contractsagreements Understand the gas flow methods and desired commercial results Facilitate setup of transportgathering contracts Facilitate setup of facilitiesmeters Create purchase deals in SITARA Maintain transport rates coordination role for CGAS CNG CNR etc Review calc sheets Maintain purchase pricing Maintain intramonth volumetric estimates on CNRGather co Terry will make every effort to trouble shoot and problem solve for both the commercial and operations teams In doing so she will be looking to partner with the members of the Trading Origination Client Services Volume Management and Logistics teams to improve our processes in this very important area Terry will be replaced on the Operational Analysis team but we may choose to realign individual responsibilities to creatively manage the current workload Terry will begin to transition over the next several days but we must be very careful to maintain the current Volume Mgmt OA process during this transition time Please join me in congratulating Terry in her new role

Appalachian PrioritiesAs you know Terry Franklin is beginning to transition into the Appalachian coordination role We spent time today with Bryce Baxter Wade Price and Gloria Barkowsky to determine how best to attack the current issues As Job we determined that Terrys time is best utilized on transportation contract setup Of course Terry job description includes other tasks but at this time this is her focus We decided this for the following reasons Deals cannot be pathed without transportation contracts setup in SITARA In order to pay the producers and the pipeline the deals must be pathed by Logistics zero volume paths and volumes must by allocated based on actuals by Gloria Barkowsky Volume Mgmt Wade Price Settlements is focused on setting up SITARA deals for producer wellhead purchases Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns Thanks Carrie

Darron GironEMW Risk Management Lead Cc pleased to announce that Darron Giron accepted a position as the Enron MidWest Risk Management Lead Darron brings a solid set of risk management settlements and accounting experience to this new role and we are looking forward to utilizing his expertise in this new capacity Darron will office in Houston while travelling regularly to Chicago to buil d relationships and facilitate communication He will be replaced on the Central Risk Management team and we are actively seeking a replacement Effective immediately Darron is the appropriate Houston contact for EMW questions He will continue to report to me and I am the contact in Darrons abscence Please help us to shape this new role by reviewing the role definition belo w and by providing your input Communicate regularlybuild strong relationships with commercial origination and trading teams and with the appropriate Peoples personnel Review PL and position reports daily and be prepared to answer questions Provide andor track down risk management technical expertise Assist in meeting reporting needs for commercial and Peoples teams Coordinate with Houston structuring group to help book structured transactions Coordinate with other Houston Energy Operations functional teams to ensur e a smooth operation Settlements Gas Accounting Deal Validation Operational Analysis Risk Mgmt Logistics etc Facilitate setup of EMW Enron Online activity Facilitate EMWs UNIFY implementation Schedule regular trips to Chicago and establish a visible presence in Chicago office Be prepared to travel outside of regular schedule when necessary Please provide your input on the above role definition so that we may incorporate your needs Please join me in congratulating Darron in his new role Thanks Carrie Hollomon

Darron GironEMW Risk Management Lead Cc pleased to announce that Darron Giron accepted a position as the Enron MidWest Risk Management Lead Darron brings a solid set of risk management settlements and accounting experience to this new role and we are looking forward to utilizing his expertise in this new capacity Darron will office in Houston while travelling regularly to Chicago to buil d relationships and facilitate communication He will be replaced on the Central Risk Management team and we are actively seeking a replacement Effective immediately Darron is the appropriate Houston contact for EMW questions He will continue to report to me and I am the contact in Darrons abscence Please help us to shape this new role by reviewing the role definition belo w and by providing your input Communicate regularlybuild strong relationships with commercial origination and trading teams and with the appropriate Peoples personnel Review PL and position reports daily and be prepared to answer questions Provide andor track down risk management technical expertise Assist in meeting reporting needs for commercial and Peoples teams Coordinate with Houston structuring group to help book structured transactions Coordinate with other Houston Energy Operations functional teams to ensur e a smooth operation Settlements Gas Accounting Deal Validation Operational Analysis Risk Mgmt Logistics etc Facilitate setup of EMW Enron Online activity Facilitate EMWs UNIFY implementation Schedule regular trips to Chicago and establish a visible presence in Chicago office Be prepared to travel outside of regular schedule when necessary Please provide your input on the above role definition so that we may incorporate your needs Please join me in congratulating Darron in his new role Thanks Carrie Hollomon

Re Elizabeth SotoI am happy to hear about the improvement ceh Phillip M Love PM To Carrie ct Susan CT cc Subject Elizabeth Soto Just wanted to follow up with you guys on a conversation we had in a recent staff meeting I personally have noticed a dramatic improvement in the phase I process that Elizabeth is responsible for She has definitely become more comfortable with the process and we are seeing significantly less entry errors I checked with the others and these comments seem to reflect everyones feelings Just thought I would update you guys Thanks PL

WorkhoursAs we enter the new year I think we should all be reminded of Enrons work hour policies and the environment in which we operate Enron supports and encourages flexible work hours parttime etc Additionally the policies allow us generous personal time family time sick leave vacation time etc We are supported and encouraged to put our health and families first This culture allow us many freedoms and it does not dictate a clockwatcher mentality However we are all paid to give Enron a minimum of a hour work week or some other agreed upon parttime amount This hours does not include your lunch hour As you are all aware many of our fellow coworkers on the th floor are required to give much more than hours a week Please do not abuse the privileges we are afforded and do not tarnish the reputation of our group Thanks for all of your hard work and cooperation Carrie

Re Individual goalsgoals are saved in the OA drive under the new Goals directory Thanks Carrie Carrie Hollomon PM To Phillip M CT Monique CT Mary Theresa CT Cathy De La CT Janie CT Gregory A CT Melba A CT cc Subject Individual goals Hello I updated our Goals and Objectives to include items that we discussed in this weeks staff meeting Please use this list when you build your own individual goals for your performance review Of course your list should include items specific to your desk but we will all have to work together to accomplish our team goals I envision that we may establish a responsible personpersons for each of the team goals so that can divide and conquer Thanks again for all of your effort this year and I look forward to an even better Year Thanks Carrie

Individual goalsI updated our Goals and Objectives to include items that we discussed in this weeks staff meeting Please use this list when you build your own individual goals for your performance review Of course your list should include items specific to your desk but we will all have to work together to accomplish our team goals I envision that we may establish a responsible personpersons for each of the team goals so that can divide and conquer Thanks again for all of your effort this year and I look forward to an even better Year Thanks Carrie

Risk Meeting notesThe list that I referred to at yesterdays meeting Thanks Carrie Forwarded by Carrie HollomonHOUECT on PM Enron North America Corp From Jeffrey C Gossett AM To Carrie ct William CT Steve CT Dutch CT cc Susan CT Steve CT Brent A CT Subject Risk Meeting notes Here are the top issues which the top performers in risk identified in this mornings meeting in no particular order All physical curves out by All financial curves out by Streamline nightly checkout process No more deal tickets Systems person or persons on the floor Notification of any curve change in the system Specific cut off time for all deal tickets Cross regional training Stock options Backups for all big books Combat Pay Only nd yr analysts Automatic notification when a deal has been changed Canada Logistics or trader I dont think any of these requests is unreasonable

Late days Cc As you know all too well your job does not offer you all of the flexibility that you might like In an effort to give you a little more free time we will start with the following plan Whats a late day and who gets them Each book calcer will sign up for a one late day a month A late day is defined as a one in which you do not come into the office until pm When can I have one The late days to sign up for include any day MondayFriday excluding bid week thru nd workday Only one person can be out with a late day each day Whos my backup When you enjoy your late day your backup as defined below is responsible for your activities until pm If the following backup schedule needs to change lets make that quickly If you need additional security access to backup someone then put that request in immediately Each of the backups should swap jobs for a few days until pm to practice your responsibilities If the backup plan is successful then we can potentially expand our creative work schedule possibilities We must prove that it will work however before can take any more steps When do we start All regions will implement in June Irena will coordinate the calendar next week Let me know what you think Carrie

A complimentI wanted to pass on a compliment that you all received this weekend Jason Williams told me that the entire Central risk team was extremely helpful and patient that you respond to requests with a great attitude and that he was especially impressed with your responsive to the traders requests even though these things cause you to stay later in the evening Keep it up You impress people Carrie

Good Friday Cc I will meet you in the middle work until noon on Friday and then get out of here It is hard to justify our team taking the entire day off since our responsbilities are not completely dependent on daily trading activities or nomination activities That of course IS TRUE for Logistics and Risk To be consistent I will give the OA team the same info Volume Mgmt and Settlements will be jealous Thanks Carrie

Re Elizabeth SotoI am happy to hear about the improvement ceh Phillip M Love PM To Carrie ct Susan CT cc Subject Elizabeth Soto Just wanted to follow up with you guys on a conversation we had in a recent staff meeting I personally have noticed a dramatic improvement in the phase I process that Elizabeth is responsible for She has definitely become more comfortable with the process and we are seeing significantly less entry errors I checked with the others and these comments seem to reflect everyones feelings Just thought I would update you guys Thanks PL
